item.title: What's It Like to Have Sex? (Against The Political Impositions of Dogmatic Natural Science)
item.description: The year is 202X, and alien life has finally found its way to Earth. These Alien beings are far more technologically advanced than us humans. In a matter of months, they teach us what would have taken centuries to discover: travel at the speed of light, among other things. These Aliens reproduce sexually, just like us. However, they go about it by means of external fertilizationâ€”the female lays her eggs in a location where, later, a male will fertilize them.
